nrqlQueries.query: FROM Metric SELECT latest(device_name) AS 'Device Name', latest(src_addr) AS 'Device IP', latest(kentik.snmp.Uptime)/8640000 AS 'Uptime (Days)', latest(SysObjectID) AS 'SysObjectID', latest(entity.type) AS 'NR Entity Type', latest(instrumentation.name) AS 'Ktranslate Profile', latest(timestamp) AS 'Last Update', latest(PollingHealth) AS 'Polling Health', latest(PollingHealthReason) AS 'Health Reason' WHERE provider = 'kentik-wap'
FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.CPU) AS 'Current CPU %' WHERE provider = 'kentik-wap'
FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.MemoryUtilization) AS 'Current Memory %' WHERE provider = 'kentik-wap'
FROM Metric SELECT average(kentik.snmp.CPU) AS 'Average', min(kentik.snmp.CPU) AS 'Min', max(kentik.snmp.CPU) AS 'Max' WHERE provider = 'kentik-wap' TIMESERIES 5 MINUTES

FROM Metric SELECT average(kentik.snmp.MemoryUtilization) AS 'Average', min(kentik.snmp.MemoryUtilization) AS 'Min', max(kentik.snmp.MemoryUtilization) AS 'Max' WHERE provider = 'kentik-wap' TIMESERIES 5 MINUTES
FROM Metric SELECT latest(if_OperStatus) AS 'Operational Status' FACET if_interface_name AS 'Interface', if_Type AS 'Interface Type' WHERE provider = 'kentik-wap' LIMIT MAX
FROM Metric SELECT rate(max(kentik.snmp.ifHCInOctets)*8/1000/1000, 1 second) AS 'Mbps' FACET if_interface_name WHERE provider = 'kentik-wap' TIMESERIES 5 MINUTES LIMIT MAX
FROM Metric SELECT rate(max(kentik.snmp.ifHCOutOctets)*8/1000/1000, 1 second) AS 'Mbps' FACET if_interface_name WHERE provider = 'kentik-wap' TIMESERIES 5 MINUTES LIMIT MAX
